bropals.lib.simplegame.gui

Class GuiGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.gui.GuiGroup

  • public class GuiGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Makes it easier to group GuiElements together.

    • Method Detail

      • addElement

        public void addElement(GuiElement element)
        Adds an element to this GuiGroup
        Parameters:
        element - the element to add

      • removeElement

        public void removeElement(GuiElement element)
        Removes an element from this GuiGroup
        Parameters:
        element - the element to remove

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Checks to see if this GuiGroup is enabled.
        Returns:
        the enabled state of this GuiGroup.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the enabled state of this GuiGroup. When this GuiGroup is not enabled, then it will not draw, update, or react to input even when its functions are called.
        Parameters:
        enabled - the new enabled state.

      • update

        public void update(int mouseX,
          int mouseY)
        Updates all elements in this GuiGroup
        Parameters:
        mouseX - the current X mouse position
        mouseY - the current Y mouse position

      • render

        public void render(java.lang.Object graphicsObject)
        Draws all elements in this GuiGroup
        Parameters:
        graphicsObject - the graphics object to draw this GuiGroup with

      • mouseInput

        public void mouseInput(int mouseX,
              int mouseY)
        Sends mouse pressed input to all elements in this GuiGroup
        Parameters:
        mouseX - the X mouse position
        mouseY - the Y mouse position
